transcript_chunks.text: I did get Legend of Zelda Nintendo switch light Nintendo 7 though I didn't need to wait in line or anything for this which is special to me so we got a little Triforce down uh next to the right analog stick and then we got the big Triforce kind of like emblem I like this a lot yeah man it's pretty sick the light is under freaking rated this thing is awesome
